title: Beast Tamer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Tame your beast to devour someone at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Your beast will deal a powerful attack, and will clean your target's role, last will, etc.
-After killing someone with your beast, the beast has to rest the following night. However, you may still decide to send It to devour someone. If you do, there Is a â…“ chance of failing to tame the beast, resulting in It dealing a Powerful attack to one of your Pale Moon allies (May include yourself)
-After killing twice, that Is upped to a 80% chance
-After killing thrice, the beast must rest.
-Once the PMCS begins, your beast deals an Unstoppable Attack, and will not need to rest every night, nor will It accidentally kill one of your allies

fields.value:
